title: Assault Ladder (6U58)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-hai to place an [Isengard] token on this card. Skirmish: Spot 3 [Isengard] tokens here to make an Uruk-hai strength +3. Discard this condition.
Lore:	”'It is a great host….'”
Rarity:	U
